name: 陳怡倩
objective: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1 Course introduction; Unit 4: The Good Life
Week 2 Unit 4 cont.
Week 3 Unit 5: Survival
Week 4 Unit 5 cont.
Week 5 Unit 6 Art Matters
Week 6 Unit 6 cont.
Week 7 Review
Week 8 Class mid-term exam
Week 9 Campus-wide English proficiency test 
Week 10 Review of class mid-term exam
Week 11 Unit 7: Getting Around
Week 12 Unit 7 cont.
Week 13 Unit 8: Competition
Week 14 Unit 8 cont.
Week 15 Unit 9: Danger
Week 16 Unit 9 cont.
Week 17 Final exam
Week 18 Final exam review
scorePolicy: Participation & class activities (20%); class mid-term examination (25%); class final examination (35%); mid-term English proficiency examination (20%).
materials: World English Level 3: Real People, Real Places, Real Language
